    WTF is the Olympic Games?

    'Olympic Games' is just a simple ranking idea. Don't take it too seriously. It is just for fun.

  • 2

    I want some rewards. Will I receive an award?

    No. No rewwwards will be given here.

  • 3

    This site is bullshit. How do I get mad at you?

    Take a piece of paper. Write your message on it. Then flush it down the toilet.

  • 4

    Is this just another web design gallery?

    We would like to think slightly other way. Think blog/magazine showcasing solid pieces of work. I guess that's not far off. Oh well.

  • 5

    Can I submit my fabulous website?

    Sure. DM us at @theprimalurge or fill this Google form.

    No. Maybe some other day.

    What is this? Golden Globes?

    Where are the winners?

    In our eyes, websites & authors featured here are all winners.

  • 9

    Are you suggesting that this website is the golden example?

    No way. Just look at our class names. Jesus... No.

  • 10

    I dig it. How can I help?

    Tell your friends & family about it. Stay positive.
